ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Richard M.L. Blair ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. RICHARD M.L. BLAIR, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective May 1, 2013.
